safetyTips: We are operating using government guidelines.
name: CHEGWORTH VALLEY
address: Chegworth Valley, Water Lane, Harrietsham, Kent, ME17 1DE
description: Chegworth Valley are a Kent based family run farm. Producing juices and produce we are delivering across the UK. Fruit and Vegetable boxes plus a number of essential items. Delivery is either by one of our own vans or courier depending on location.  Order online or by phone.
